features: Mini Sized: Our lint roller perfect for those who like to travel with their sticky roller or keep in a purse, car, or carryon, easily keep your clothes tidy anytime, anywhere.
Easy Tear Design: The lint roller for travel sticker with the diagonal peel design will not get stuck when rolling, you can smoothly peel off each sticker, easy to replace next new sheets.

Excellent Adhesive Performance: Our lint rollers for pet hair are exceptionally sticky, delivering superior adhesive performance for thorough removal of lint, dog and cat hair, and dust with each swipe. The adhesive sheets are crafted to capture even the tiniest particles, leaving your clothes and surroundings spotless.

Versatile Lint Remover: The lint remover for clothes is perfect for your routine home cleaning, office cleaning, and traveling. Our travel size lint rollers are versatile and can be used on not only your clothes but also your furniture, upholstery, and more.
150 SHEETS Economy Value Pack: Package is included 3 lint roller- total 150 sheets, economy value pack lint rollers set can be long-lasting to meet your everyday clean needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Lint Rollers for Pet Hair Mega Value Set, and I must say, it's a game changer for pet owners. With 400 extra sticky sheets spread over 4 rollers, this set has made cleaning clothes, furniture, and carpets from dog and cat hair incredibly easy and efficient. The upgraded handles provide a comfortable grip, making the task of removing pet hair less tedious and more enjoyable. It's not just a lint roller; it's a must-have tool for anyone looking to keep their living space clean and pet hair-free. Highly recommend for its outstanding performance and value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are probably the stickiest lint rollers I’ve used, great for taking off hair and lint from clothes. Also the easiest for tearing off a sheet, comes off without tearing next sheet. Great deal, if you go thru rollers like we do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It might still be okay for everyday use
reviews.reviewText: Compare to other more expensive brands, the lint roller price is cheap, it’s working smoothly and do remove some hairs and furs. However, roller's performance is not as outstanding as other well-known brands. It’s not easy to tear off for the next sheet. For everyday use, it might still be okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this lint roller for my household because it is better than most I have used before. I have 3 cats so I have cat hair everywhere. After trying many before, I can say this one takes all the stars. Its easy to use, doesn't get stuck mid way, its very sticky so you can use one sheet multiple times and it still works, and each roll has 100 sheets. So its thicker than most lint rollers. One box will last me up to 3 months with 3 cats. Which makes it perfect for me because I no longer need to spend money on a month to month basis for lint rollers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed with how these lint rollers pick up all the hair and lint and even more.
reviews.reviewText: After trying these lint rollers I won’t buy any other lint rollers! I have 6 cats and these have to be a must have in my household. I love how they’re super sticky and easy to peel off. I use it for not just my clothes but also my sheets and couch. I love how it comes with two of the wand things and the refillers I can keep one in my bathroom and another in my car for when I’m running late to work. I love these definitely recommend super affordable and work better than any other lint roller I’ve tried and that’s my honest opinion! These are especially perfect for people with pets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good points and bad points
reviews.reviewText: For the most part this lint roller is great on clothes, but for upholstered furniture I would only give it 3 stars. I have one Lab and after 5 sheets of trying to get the fur off one cushion (there wasn’t that much) I gave up. I got enough off to throw the cushion covers in the washing machine. Next issue is nearly impossible to peel to a clean sticky sheet. There is no indication as to where to start. I will tell you it is next to the handle near a spiral line, but you will have to work at it to get it started. Seems like such an easy fix for a company to make to put a mark where to start peeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a good value!
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it came with 2 re-fills, is extra sticky and gets the job done. It looks a bit plain and would be nice if it had a catchy name. We have several labs in and out of our house so the pet hair is continuous and it's nice to not carry our pets love with us everywhere! Maybe call it Pet Glitter Catcher or something along those lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reviews made this seem like it was an ultra sticky material, but it’s really a minor step up from Scotch brand. It does the job, but the cut of the sheets makes it a pain to strip them off to get to the next one, and each sheet is only good for a few passes. Not really worth purchasing over any other brand on the market, unfortunately.**update**The seller took it upon themselves to privately contact me to apologize for my experience and make things right. I did not expect this and I’m impressed with their responsiveness. Great customer service experience. I added a star for that alone.
They do the job, but not any better than the dollar store rollers. Was hoping for extra sticky as per review.
